## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for stack size etc.

reporting. This is basically a function and a size.

Definition at line 431 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
